directions: Stir hot water, sugar, and instant coffee together in a bowl until sugar and coffee are dissolved. Add milk, chocolate syrup, and vanilla extract; mix well. Chill in refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight. Stir ice cream into punch before serving.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can chocolate syrup (such as Hershey's®)
title: Holiday Mocha Punch
